text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump South Korea and the US had their first Covid-19 patient the same day, 2.20.

South Korea acted. 

Trump delivered Americans 10* the likelihood of getting infected w the novel coronavirus, compared to South Korea. And 20* the likelihood of dying.

Trump owns every avoidable death.
